emailTemplates.name: default
emailTemplates.text:
Dear %s,

I am writing this email to express my interest in pursuing my postgraduate research under your supervision.

I am Md Najim Ahmed and I have completed my BSc in Computer Science and Engineering from Jahangirnagar University, Bangladesh with CGPA 3.18/4.00 in English as the medium of instruction. During my academic years, I have participated in several programming contests with remarkable performance record and served as a Teaching Assistant for more than two years. After working for 5 years as a software development professional I feel the urge to acquire specialized knowledge in the field of information & technology which motivates me for doing higher study.

Moreover, I have found that my area of interest greatly intersects with your research work. I would appreciate the chance to talk about your upcoming research projects and pitch to you how my outstanding programming skill and year-long industrial experience makes me a great candidate.

I have attached my CV in the attachment to this email for your kind perusal but if there is additional information that I have not included that you would like, I would be happy to provide it to you.

I thank you for your consideration and look forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely yours,
Md Najim Ahmed
